name: On The Edge (AKking_YT)
description:
You are the Boss of a large company built on a cliff.  Un-ironically your company is currently on the edge of bankruptcy because your neglect. Now that all of your workers have left you have too run the entire company by yourself!

This is a simple tycoon game I made for Vimjam 2! I've always wanted to make a tycoon game but never could figure it out but this week i finally did >O<
